title: random text message in game
body: has anyone gotten the messages repsonde to aggression - sastate7 ? like i dont know what it means or where it came from but in came it kept popping up for everyone

replies.body: It's a known issue, an unintended debug message essentially, no ETA on a fix but my best guess would be next patch at the latest.
Yes I have got it many times. Riot will get onto it the next patch. It's not just you, they might just be having a few issues they will address it next patch I imagine :)
